title: 关于维克的现代战争模组崩溃的问题
author: eason95482
txt_content:
没有Optfine一进入世界后物品栏翻页到2/3就崩溃了
有Optfine不会崩溃但模型错乱，一开镜就黑屏。快速渲染关了也一样。
模组是1.11.7.7，游戏本身是1.12.2，Java是1.8.0_241-b07，forge14.23.5.2847,Opfine是HD_U_F5
carsh_reports里的崩溃信息（没装Optfine）在这
求解！
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  CustomSkinLoader (CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.11.jar)
  weaponlib (mw-1.11.7.7_mc1.12.2.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content:
渲染错误
建议更新optifine版本到最新
有独立显卡就用

replies.author: 明月妹子233
replies.txt_content: 你的电脑问题 你设置一些游戏内存 设置大点 求给最佳

replies.author: 明月妹子233
replies.txt_content: 游戏内存调大 维克很吃配置的 希望给个最佳

replies.author: 拥丶
replies.txt_content:
你使用的版本不支持高于14.23.4.2759forge版本，模组作者说的。
作者原话：Be aware that this mod has issues with some versions of forge for MC 1.12.2 higher than 14.23.4.2759 and that Forge made a change on their side that we're not responsible for. DO NOT report crashes if you have the latest version of Forge installed. To fix this, install the Optifine mod or downgrade forge.
最新forge只能用最新2.0测试版

replies.author: ylhylhylhylh
replies.txt_content: 你好，请换成2765版本的FORGE,应该可以的，希望能帮到你
